description: Try our easy to follow Classic Chinese Wontons recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Classic Chinese Wontons Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 scallions, white and green parts, finely chopped
115g shiitake mushrooms, stemmed and finely chopped
0.5 fresh ginger, the piece should be of 5 cm before cutting it, peeled and shredded

recipeInstructions.text: Mix the pork, scallions, mushrooms, ginger, sesame oil, cilantro, soy sauce, and pepper.

Spoon a teaspoon of the pork mixture into the center of a wrapper. Brush the edges lightly with egg, fold the wrapper in half, and crimp the edges to seal. Transfer to a cornstarch-dusted baking sheet.

Fill a large saucepan about one-fourth full of water and bring to a boil. Line a steamer with lettuce and add the wontons. Place the steamer on a rack so it sits above the water. Cover and steam the dumplings for 10 minutes or until cooked through. Serve at once.
